amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Director of the National Flood Insurance Program, upon the completion by the International Joint Commission of The Upper Great Lakes Study, to request the Army Corps of Engineers to complete a new flood map for the region to help the NFIP develop 100-year and 500-year flood plains.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 16 printed in House Report 109-530 to instruct the director of the National Flood Insurance Program, upon the completion of the IJC Study of the Upper Great Lakes, to request the Army Corps of Engineers to complete a new flood map for the region to help the NFIP develop 100 year and 500 year flood plains.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 304 (Roll no. 324).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mrs. Miller (MI).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (MI) amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 120 - 304 (Roll no. 324).
